issues.title: Missing showRawText state declaration

issues.testScenario: Toggle raw text view and verify no crashes occur

issues.title: Undefined store method updateAnalysis
issues.description: Page calls updateAnalysis() which doesn't exist in the store

issues.solution: Use setDataPool() instead: const { setDataPool } = useAnalysisStore.getState(); setDataPool(updatedDataPool);
issues.testScenario: Verify store updates when dataPool changes

issues.title: TypeScript error: screenshot type conversion
